## Example presentation 1

## Sexuality
```{r}
nh_tbl <- as_tibble(NHANES)
# nh_tbl %>% filter(!is.na(SexOrientation)) %>% ggplot(aes(SexOrientation)) + geom_bar()
nh_tbl %>% filter(!is.na(SexOrientation)) %>% ggplot(aes(SexOrientation)) + geom_bar(aes(fill=Gender))
nh_tbl %>% filter(!is.na(SexOrientation),SexOrientation!="Heterosexual") %>% ggplot(aes(SexOrientation)) + geom_bar(aes(fill=Gender))
nh_tbl %>% filter(!is.na(SexOrientation),SexOrientation!="Heterosexual") %>% ggplot(aes(SexOrientation)) + geom_bar(aes(fill=SameSex))
nh_tbl %>% filter(!is.na(SexOrientation),SexOrientation=="Heterosexual") %>% ggplot(aes(SameSex)) + geom_bar(aes(fill=Gender))
```
